questions.question: Confirm the Equipment with below provided image.
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again
confirm for any physical Damage of the Equipment
kindly prepare the Incident / Damage and Missing Report.
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON.
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC voltage of 230.

videos.src: assets/videos/ELISA READER/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE WALL OUTLET.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE WALL OUTLET

questions.question: shift the Equipment to another place where the AC voltage of 230 is provided
check the power cord continuity as shown in the video and confirm whether the power cord is defective

videos.src: assets/videos/ELISA READER/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE POWER CORD CABLE..mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE POWER CORD CABLE.

questions.question: then replace the power cord with the new one
check the fuses for continuity and confirm whether they are defective.

videos.videoName: Video required for checking the fuses

questions.question: replace the fuses with a new one

videos.src: assets/videos/ELISA READER/VIDEO FOR REPLACING THE FUSES..mp4

questions.question: open the equipment as shown in the video. Check and confirm whether output voltages are available at SMPS.
replace / repair the SMPS with a new one
replace / repair the control Board

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the control board

questions.question: check and confirm whether the display is getting ON.
open the equipment as shown in the video. Check and confirm for any loose connections or breakage of cables from display to display control board and from control board to display control board
reseat or replace the cable accordingly
replace the display control board with a new one. Check and confirm whether the problem still persist.

videos.videoName: Video for replacing Display control board

questions.question: cross check the display and confirm whether the display is defective.
replace the display with a new one
replace the Control Board with a new one

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the control board

questions.question: check and confirm whether the lamp in the optical module is glowing
open the cover of optical assembly. Check the continuity of the lamp and confirm whether it is defective
replace the lamp with a new one
check and confirm whether the keys on keypad are functional / working.
open the top cover, remove the soft keypad assemble and replace it with a new one
check and confirm whether the plate does not move properly
check whether the motor is defective.
replace the motor with a new one
repair / replace the driver motor board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing driver motor board

questions.question: If the problem is not yet solved, contact the Technical Team for any other assistance through video call
Thanks
